commands.description: Toggles the announcements in the current channel when someone joins the server.

Sets the announcement message when someone joins the server.
Placeholders:
`%mention%` - will mention the user
`%user%` - will write the user's username
`%server%` or `%guild%` - will put the name of the server
Embeds are supported, json form. If the preview is not an embed, then it means the json message is not correct
Toggles the announcements in the current channel when someone leaves the server.

Sets the announcement message when someone leaves the server.
Placeholders:
`%mention%` - will mention the user
`%user%` - will write the user's username
`%server%` or `%guild%` - will put the name of the server
Embeds are supported, json form.
Sets the current channel as "mod-log" channel where I will post notifications about warn, mute, unmute, kick, ban, softban, pruneban. Provide no arguments to disable it from the current channel.
Creates a category channel.
Deletes a category channel. The category's ID is supported.
Renames a category channel. Separate the old name from the new name with '->'. The category's ID is supported.
Adds a text channel to a category channel. Separate the channel name from the category name with '->'. The category's ID and text channel's ID are supported.
Adds a voice channel to a category channel. Separate the channel name from the category name with '->'. The category's ID and voice channel's ID are supported.
Adds an emoji in this server. PNG, JPG or GIF supported. The image's size must be under 256 KB.
Deletes an emoji from this server. 'Mentioning' the emoji is supported.
Renames an emoji on this server. Separate the old name by the new name with '->'. 'Mentioning' the emotes are supported.
Kicks a user. If you provide a reason message I will DM the user with the reason.
Bans a user. If you provide a reason message I will DM the user with the reason.
Bans a user with the option to remove his messages from last 7 days, and then unbans it. The result is a kick.
Bans a user with the option to remove his messages from last 7 days. Different from "softban" where the user is unbanned.

`[prefix]prune x` removes last x number of messages from the channel (up to 100, including yours).
`[prefix]prune @User` removes all User's messages in the last 100 messages (including yours).
Mutes a user from text and voice channels. You can mute with a timeout and/or you can provide a reason.
Unmutes a user from text and voice channels. You can provide a reason.
Sets the mute role. If the role doesn't exist it will be created.
Shows the roles on this server, paginated.
Creates a role with the provided name.
Deletes the role you provide.

Sets the color for a role. The color can be a hex format or a html name, '#' is optional.
If the role's name has more than one word use quotation marks to properly take the role.
Renames a role. You have to separate the old name by the new name with '->'.
Sets the role to be or not displayed independently in the users list.
Sets the role to be or not mentioned.
Adds/Sets a role to a user.
Removes a role from a user.
Sets a role to be auto-assigned for every user who joins the server. Provide no role to deactivate it.
Assign to yourself a role from this server's self assignable roles list.
Remove from yourself a role from this server's self assignable roles list.
Adds a role in this server's self assignable roles list.
Removes a role in this server's self assignable roles list.
Shows this server's self assignable roles list, paginated.
Sets a user's nickname in this server. Provide no arguments to remove its nickname.
I will set your nickname in this server if you have the permission to change your nickname. Provide no arguments for me to remove your nickname.
Sets this server's name.
Sets this server's icon.
Creates a text channel.
Deletes a text channel.
Renames a text channel. Separate the old name from the new one with '->'.
Shows the current channel topic.
Sets this channel topic.
Toggles this channel or another channel as NSFW.
Creates a voice channel.
Deletes a voice channel.
Renames a voice channel. Separate the old name from the new one with '->'.
Warn a user. Also, you can specify a reason.
Shows all warned users in this server, paginated, or shows all warnings for a user.

Clear one warning by ID or all of a user.
Administrators can clear any warning and moderators can clear only their added warnings to a user.
Shows the current warning punishment in this server.

Sets the warning punishment (mute, kick, ban, softban or pruneban) and the number of warnings (maximum 10) that trigger it.
 Set it to 0 to disable the current warning punishment.
Makes me to leave a guild/server.
Bye bye ;-;
Yay, a new update <3
I will send a message to a user <u:user-id> or to a channel from a server <c:channel-id>. Embed is supported.
I will edit a message that I own and is available in a server <channel-id|message-id>. Embed is supported.
Searches a user from Discord and shows its info.
Evaluates a C# code.
Sets my activity to `Playing`, `Listening to`, `Watching` or `Streaming`. Rotation is supported, in seconds.
Sets my status to Online, Idle/AFK, DnD/DoNotDisturb, Invisible/Offline.
Deletes a user from the database. The currency, global xp, waifus and profile settings will be erased.
Shows details about a user from the database.
Adds a user to the blacklist. It will cannot generate global xp and it will cannot receive [currency].
Removes a user from the blacklist. It will can generate global xp and will can receive [currency].
Bans a user from using me. It will also be added to the blacklist.
Unbans a user, allow it to use me. It will not be removed from the blacklist (if it is).
Toggles the deletion of the user's message that triggered the command.
Bet on wheel. You can win up to 2x [currency] of the bet.

Play a game of blackjack.

Options:
- hit(🎴) - draw a card from the deck
- stand(🤚) - stand with your cards
- split(↔) - split your hand in two if you have a pair

The game is played with 4 decks. And you lose the draws.
Resumes the blackjack session in this channel.
Stops the blackjack session, you will also lose the bet.
Shows the currency you have or for a user.
Rewards a user with some amount of [currency].
Takes some amount of [currency] from a user.
Shows a list with [currency] of users.
Get your daily [currency].
Play a game of rock-paper-scissors.
Ask 8 ball a question.
Shows a help info for a command, or shows the general help info if no arguments are given.
Shows all modules and submodules.
Shows all commands of a module or submodule.
I will DM you with all commands.
Shows a hentai image. Tags are supported (up to 3), separate them by comma. A tag formed from multiple words contains whitespaces.
Shows a hentai image from Danbooru. Tags are supported (up to 3), separate them by comma. A tag formed from multiple words contains whitespaces.
Shows a hentai image from Konachan. Tags are supported (up to 3), separate them by comma. A tag formed from multiple words contains whitespaces.
Shows a hentai image from Yandere. Tags are supported (up to 3), separate them by comma. A tag formed from multiple words contains whitespaces.
Shows a hentai image from Gelbooru. Tags are supported (up to 3), separate them by comma. A tag formed from multiple words contains whitespaces.
Shows multiple hentai images from Danbooru, Konachan, Yandere and Gelbooru. Tags are supported (up to 3), separate them by comma. A tag formed from multiple words contains whitespaces.
Shows your profile or for a user.

Sets the profile's background image. Price: 1000 [currency].
Only https. Direct image links, png, jpg or jpeg allowed.
For better results, resize and/or crop the image to 500x250.
NSFW images are not allowed, you will be banned.
Sets the profile's background dim. Default is 50%. 0 means the background will have the original brightness, 100 means full black.
Sets the profile's biography.

Sets the profile's color. The color can be a hex format or a html name, '#' is optional.
Only White, Red, Green, Cyan, Orange, HotPink and Magenta are available. For a custom one you must be a Patron.
Sets a profile badge. There are 3 badges that a user can have depending of its Patreon tier. To remove a badge simply provide no text.
Pat a user <3.
Hug a user <3.
Kiss a user :heart:.
Lick a user, lewd.
Cuddle a user.
Bite a user.
Slap a user.
If you cry ;-;.
Grope a user.
You are blushing.
Dance alone or with someone.
Poke a user.
Maybe someone will pat you.
Good night. See you tomorrow.
Searches on Wikipedia.
Searches on urban dictionary, paginated.
Shows info about an anime from AniList.
Shows info about a manga from AniList.

Shows info about a character from the database or AniList.
If the character is not on AniList but it is a custom character in the database use @id.
Shows a list with anime and their IDs from AniList matching the title, paginated.
Shows a list with manga and their IDs from AniList matching the title, paginated.
Shows a list with characters and their IDs from AniList matching the name, paginated.
Shows a neko girl image.
Shows a kitsune girl image.
Shows the current server's prefix.
Sets the prefix on this server.
Shows the available languages.
Sets my language on this server.
Invite me to your server.
Support this project on Patreon.
Shows a list with all users that support this project, ordered by their donation amount, paginated.
Vote me to become more popular.
Shows a list with all users that voted in the last specified time, default is 12 hours, paginated.
Pong.
I will choose an item from a list. Separators: `,`, `|`, `;`.
Generates a preview image of a hex color or a html name color. '#' is optional.
Calculates a math expression.

Convert from a unit to another. You don't have to specify the category, but for explicit cases where some units have the same abbreviations in different categories, you can use it.
The units names can or not contain spaces; if they do use quotes.
The units singular, plural or abbreviation names can be used, then compatible units will be searched to match with the first unit. The abbreviations are case-sensitive.

Shows all the units categories from the converter, paginated.
If a category is provided then it shows all the units from that category, paginated.
Shows my stats.
Shows the info for a user. Provide no arguments to show your info.
Shows the info for this server.
Shows the connection state of all shards.
Shows the avatar for a user. Provide no arguments to show your avatar.
Shows the icon of this server.
Shows a list with all users from the server that play a game.

Claim a waifu, this can be from the database or AniList.
If the ID starts with `@` then the character will be searched by ID on database, if not then the character will be searched first, by name, on database then on AniList.

The price for every waifu usually starts from 1000 [currency] and grows for each claim with 10 [currency], also it will decrease for each divorce.
Divorce from a waifu.
Shows all your waifus or for a user.
Make a waifu special/beloved. Only one waifu can be special, if you set another one, the previous one will have this status off. The price is 5000 [currency]. This action is not reversible.

Set an image for your special waifu or for your custom ones, the url link comes first then the waifu name or id. Oh and it's free.
NSFW images are not allowed, you will be banned.
Set the position of a waifu. Think of it as a list, if you move one above all the others below will have the position incremented.
Create a waifu. Put a direct link image and a name. The price is 10000 [currency]. She will have the beloved status automatically.
Shows your global level, global xp, server level and server xp, or for a user.
Shows the global xp leaderboard.
Shows this server xp leaderboard.

Enables or disables the server xp notifications. By default the notifications will be sent in the channel where the user leveled up. You can provide a channel and the notifications will be sent there.

Sets the xp notification message. Provide no arguments to clear the set xp notification message and use the default one.
Placeholders:
`%mention%` - will mention the user
`%user%` - will write the user's username
`%server%` or `%guild%` - will put the name of the server
`%avatar%` - will put the user's avatar url (or preview if used in an embed thumbnail or image)
`%level%` - will put the user's reached level
Embeds are supported, json form. If the preview is not an embed, then it means the json message is not correct.

Sets the xp notification message for a level up role reward. Provide no arguments to clear the set xp notification message level up role reward and use the default one.
Placeholders:
`%mention%` - will mention the user
`%user%` - will write the user's username
`%server%` or `%guild%` - will put the name of the server
`%avatar%` - will put the user's avatar url (or preview if used in an embed thumbnail or image)
`%level%` - will put the user's reached level
`%role%` - will put the rewarded role's name
`%role_mention%` - will put the rewarded role's mention
Embeds are supported, json form. If the preview is not an embed, then it means the json message is not correct.
remarks: {0}xpmr Congratulations %mention%! You are now level %level% and received role %role%.
{0}xpmr Congratulations %mention%! You reached level %level%. You are now %role%.

commands.description:
Adds a role in the level up role reward list.
When a user reaches the level it will be rewarded with the role.
To remove a role from the list provide no role for the respective level.
Shows the with level up role reward list.
Resets this server xp leaderboard.
